name: CRO Predict
description: CRO Predict is a prediction market GameFi with a predict-to-earn mechanics. Users will be able to predict the future outcome of events ranging from cryptocurrency prices to sports games. Our first prediction gamefi is the crypto price prediction, then the sports predictions comes next, more games will be released as well. Unlike other traditional prediction products, there are more risks than rewards. However, CRO Predict bridges the gap between those who won or lost by rewarding all participants
